description.value:
You're skilled with flashy weapons. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bo Staff]{Bo Staff}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Dueling Cape]{Dueling Cape} (page 249), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spiked Chain]{Spiked Chain}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Sword Cane]{Sword Cane} (page 248), and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Whip]{Whip}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed.
